detaileddescription.para: the particle class has to be convertible into numeric data type; That means that a particle must define the Numeric conversion operator; operator Numeric() const. that returns the weight, and the method setWeight(Numeric) that sets the weight.

memberdef.argsstring: (OutputIterator &out, const Iterator &begin, const Iterator &end, Numeric lmax)
memberdef.name: toLogForm

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< int > &indexes, const WeightVector &weights, unsigned int nparticles=0)
memberdef.name: resample
